name: Sokward
description:
Can you survive the first week at Whale College without being too socially awkward? And are people really what they seem to be at this college?

Sokward is a local multiplayer game that explores social awkwardness. The players must engage in conversations with a wide variety of characters, and either cooperate to try to fit in or work against each other and end up being the weird new student. Through interactions the players will get to know their fellow students, who might not be who they appear to be.
